statements.name: PROC MVPMONITOR
statements.description: invokes the MVPMONITOR procedure and specifies input and output data sets
statements.help:
PROC MVPMONITOR <options>;                 
	BY  variables;                 
	ID variables;                 
	SERIES variable;                 
	SCORECHART < / options>;                 
	SPECHART < / options>;                 
	TIME  variable;                 
	TSQUARECHART < / options>;

arguments.name: DATA=
arguments.description: specifies an input SAS data set that contains process measurement data for a Phase II analysis

arguments.name: HISTORY=
arguments.description: specifies an input SAS data set that contains process variable data augmented with principal component scores, multivariate summary statistics, and other calculated values

arguments.name: LOADINGS=
arguments.description: specifies an input SAS data set that contains eigenvalues, principal component loadings, and process variable means and standard deviations that are used to compute principal component scores and multivariate summary statistics for a Phase II analysis

arguments.name: MISSING=
arguments.description: specifies how to handle observations that have missing process variable values in the DATA= data set

arguments.name: OUTHISTORY=
arguments.description: creates an output data set that contains all the original data from the input data set, principal component scores, and multivariate summary statistics

arguments.name: PREFIX=
arguments.description: specifies the prefix to use to identify variables that contain principal component scores in the HISTORY= data set

arguments.name: RPREFIX=
arguments.description: specifies the prefix to use to identify variables that contain residuals in the HISTORY= data set

arguments.name: TABLE=
arguments.description: specifies an input SAS data set that contains summary information from a score chart, SPE chart, or chart

statements.name: BY
statements.description: produces separate analyses of observations in groups that are defined by the BY variables

statements.name: ID
statements.description: The values of the ID variables are displayed in tooltips associated with points on a or SPE chart when you create HTML output and specify the IMAGEMAP option in the ODS GRAPHICS statement

statements.name: SERIES
statements.description: The SERIES variable uniquely identifies a series of observations in the input data set to be plotted in a control chart

statements.name: SCORECHART
statements.description: produces univariate control charts of principal component scores

arguments.name: EXCHART
arguments.description: specifies that a score chart be displayed only if there are points lying outside the control limits

arguments.name: INTERVAL=
arguments.description: specifies the time interval between consecutive positions on a score chart
arguments.help: INTERVAL=DAY | DTDAY | HOUR | MINUTE | MONTH | QTR | SECOND

arguments.name: NOCHART
arguments.description: suppresses creation of score charts

arguments.name: NOHLABEL
arguments.description: suppresses the horizontal axis label of a score chart

arguments.name: NOVLABEL
arguments.description: suppresses the vertical axis label of a score chart

arguments.name: NPANELPOS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of horizontal axis plotting positions per panel

arguments.name: ODSFOOTNOTE=
arguments.description: adds a footnote to a score chart

arguments.name: ODSFOOTNOTE2=
arguments.description: adds a secondary footnote to a score chart

arguments.name: ODSTITLE=
arguments.description: specifies a title for a score chart

arguments.name: ODSTITLE2=
arguments.description: specifies a secondary title for a score chart

arguments.name: OUTTABLE=
arguments.description: creates a SAS data set that contains a summary of a score chart

arguments.name: SERIESVALUE=
arguments.description: specifies SERIES variable values that select sequences to be plotted

arguments.name: TOTPANELS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of panels used to display a score chart

arguments.name: COMP=
arguments.description: specifies the principal components whose scores are plotted

arguments.name: OVERLAY=
arguments.description: requests that multiple sequences of principal component scores be overlaid on a single control chart

arguments.name: SIGMAS=
arguments.description: specifies the width of the control limits in terms of the multiple k of a score's standard deviation

statements.name: SPECHART
statements.description: produces a control chart of the squared prediction error (SPE) statistics based on a principal component model that the MVPMODEL procedure computes

arguments.name: ALPHA=
arguments.description: specifies the probability used to compute SPE chart limits

arguments.name: CONTRIBUTIONS
arguments.description: creates contribution plots for points outside control limits

arguments.name: MAXNPLOTS=
arguments.description: specifies the maximum number of contribution plots to produce

arguments.name: MAXNVARS=
arguments.description: specifies that only the n contributions with the greatest magnitudes be displayed in the contribution plots

arguments.name: EXCHART
arguments.description: specifies that an SPE chart be displayed only if there are points lying outside control limits

arguments.name: INTERVAL=
arguments.description: specifies the time interval between consecutive positions on an SPE chart
arguments.help: INTERVAL=DAY | DTDAY | HOUR | MINUTE | MONTH | QTR | SECOND

arguments.name: NOCHART
arguments.description: suppresses creation of an SPE chart

arguments.name: NOHLABEL
arguments.description: suppresses the horizontal axis label of an SPE chart

arguments.name: NOVLABEL
arguments.description: suppresses the vertical axis label of an SPE chart

arguments.name: NPANELPOS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of horizontal axis plotting positions per panel

arguments.name: ODSFOOTNOTE=
arguments.description: adds a footnote to an SPE chart

arguments.name: ODSFOOTNOTE2=
arguments.description: adds a secondary footnote to an SPE chart

arguments.name: ODSTITLE=
arguments.description: specifies a title for an SPE chart

arguments.name: ODSTITLE2=
arguments.description: specifies a secondary title for an SPE chart

arguments.name: OUTTABLE=
arguments.description: creates a SAS data set that contains a summary of an SPE chart

arguments.name: OVERLAY
arguments.description: specifies that separate sequences of observations be plotted in a single SPE chart

arguments.name: SERIESVALUE=
arguments.description: specifies SERIES variable values selecting sequences to be plotted

arguments.name: TOTPANELS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of panels used to display an SPE chart

statements.name: TIME
statements.description: The TIME variable is a numeric variable that provides the chronological order or time values for measurements in a DATA=, HISTORY=, or TABLE= input data set

statements.name: TSQUARECHART
statements.description: produces a chart based on a principal component model that the MVPMODEL procedure computes

arguments.name: ALPHA=
arguments.description: specifies the probability used to compute chart limits

arguments.name: CONTRIBUTIONS
arguments.description: creates contribution plots for points outside the control limits

arguments.name: MAXNPLOTS=
arguments.description: specifies the maximum number of contribution plots to produce

arguments.name: MAXNVARS=
arguments.description: specifies that only the n contributions with the greatest magnitudes be displayed in the contribution plots

arguments.name: EXCHART
arguments.description: specifies that a chart be displayed only if there are points lying outside the control limits

arguments.name: INTERVAL=
arguments.description: specifies the time interval between consecutive positions on a chart
arguments.help: INTERVAL=DAY | DTDAY | HOUR | MINUTE | MONTH | QTR | SECOND

arguments.name: NOCHART
arguments.description: suppresses creation of a chart

arguments.name: NOHLABEL
arguments.description: suppresses the horizontal axis label of a chart

arguments.name: NOVLABEL
arguments.description: suppresses the vertical axis label of a chart

arguments.name: NPANELPOS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of horizontal axis plotting positions per panel

arguments.name: ODSFOOTNOTE=
arguments.description: adds a footnote to a chart

arguments.name: ODSFOOTNOTE2=
arguments.description: adds a secondary footnote to a chart

arguments.name: ODSTITLE=
arguments.description: specifies a title for a chart

arguments.name: ODSTITLE2=
arguments.description: specifies a secondary title for a chart

arguments.name: OUTTABLE=
arguments.description: creates a SAS data set that contains a summary of a chart

arguments.name: OVERLAY
arguments.description: specifies that separate sequences of observations be plotted on a single chart

arguments.name: SERIESVALUE=
arguments.description: specifies SERIES variable values selecting sequences to be plotted

arguments.name: TOTPANELS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of panels used to display a chart

arguments.name: LIMITDIST=
arguments.description: specifies the distribution that is used to compute control limits for the chart
